issue.title: [Java] Make sure alignment and memory padding conform to spec
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-186](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-186). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Per spec 8 byte alignment and padding for buffers.

comments.body:

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-186?focusedCommentId=15360095) by Kirils Mensikovs (kirilm):*

`[~xhochy]` `[~julienledem]` I don't think this should block the release – do you agree?
